RES.SMTP_Client.model.prank

Class PrankGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • RES.SMTP_Client.model.prank.PrankGenerator

  • public class PrankGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates a list of pranks by looking into the configs/messages.utf8 file.
    Author:
    Bacso Gaetan and Dutu Launay Marion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Group> generateGroups(java.util.List<Person> victims, int numberOfGroups)
      Generates n groups of victims, where n is the number given by the config file.
      java.util.List<Prank> generatePranks()
      Generates Pranks objects with its victims : for each group, the first member is the sender and everyone in the group is the recipient.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePranks

        public java.util.List<Prank> generatePranks()
        Generates Pranks objects with its victims : for each group, the first member is the sender and everyone in the group is the recipient.
        Returns:
        the list of pranks

      • generateGroups

        public java.util.List<Group> generateGroups(java.util.List<Person> victims,
                                            int numberOfGroups)
        Generates n groups of victims, where n is the number given by the config file.
        Parameters:
        victims - the list of all the victims
        numberOfGroups - the number of groups that should be formed
        Returns:
        the list of groups generated
